title: S12 Ep109: The Man Who Invented the Supernatural
itunes:title: The Man Who Invented the Supernatural
description:
One of the most fascinating and captivating characters in the world of paranormal research & the supernatural may also be one of the most misunderstood. Charles Fort, the leader of the Fortean movement challenged everything in a quest to understand something. Fort was truly a man before his time and a force that helped shape the evolution of the Supernatural.

www.jimsteinmeyer.com
